title: Rick Steves London 2015.epub Gooner
description:
Publisher: Avalon Travel Publishing; 2015 Edition edition (September 16, 2014)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1612389767
ISBN-13: 978-1612389769

You can count on Rick Steves to tell you what you really need to know when traveling in London.

With the self-guided tours in this book, youâ€™ll explore historic Big Ben, bustling Trafalgar Square, and the Tower of Londonâ€”home of the crown jewels. Learn how to save time and money on the Tube, and how to avoid the mobs at the Changing of the Guard. Investigate Londonâ€™s world-class museums, where you can trace Western civilization from the Magna Carta and Shakespeare to Van Gogh and Picasso. Venture into Sohoâ€™s theater district for a glitzy musical or a delicious Indian dinner. End a great day at a neighborhood pub, sharing a pint and a chat with a friendly local.

Rickâ€™s candid, humorous advice will guide you to good-value hotels and restaurants in delightful London neighborhoods. Youâ€™ll learn how to get around by bus and on the Tube, and which sights are worth your time and money. More than just reviews and directions, a Rick Steves guidebook is a tour guide in your pocket
